ARABIC: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Has the story reached you of the honoured guests of Ibrahim?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Has the story of Abraham's honoured guests come to you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Prophet), did the story of Abraham's honoured guests reach you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have you heard the story of the honorable guests of Abraham?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Did the news of Ibrahim’s honourable guests reach you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Has the story reached you, of the honored guests of Ibrahim
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Has there come to you information about the honored guests of Ibrahim?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Hast thou received the story of the honoured guests of Abraham?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Hath the story of Abraham's honoured guests reached thee (O Muhammad)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Have you heard the story of Abraham's honoured guests?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Hath there come Unto thee the story of Ibrahim's honoured guests?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Did you receive the story of Abraham’s honoured guests?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Has the story reached thee, of the honoured guests of Abraham?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Has the story reached you, of the honoured guests [three angels; Jibrael (Gabriel) along with another two] of Ibrahim (Abraham)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Have you heard the story of Abraham's honored guests?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Has the story of Abraham’s honorable guests reached you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Has there reached you the story of the honored guests of Abraham? -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:24] Has the story reached you — addressing the Prophet (s) — of Abraham’s honoured guests? — these were [said to be either] twelve, ten or three angels, one of whom was Gabriel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 611 (Hath the story of Abraham's honoured guests) has the event of the guests of Abraham who were honoured by being offered a calf to eat (reached thee) Muhammad?
